sect2.title: Installation de GPM
sect2.para: Installez GPM en lançant les commandes suivantes:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../gpm-1.20.1-segfault.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../gpm-1.20.1-silent.patch && LDFLAGS="-lm" ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc && make && make install && cp conf/gpm /etc && ldconfig -n -l /usr/lib/libgpm.so.1.19.0
